TEXT.TITLE: JAPAN BUYS 4,000 TONNES OF CANADIAN RAPESEED
TEXT.BODY:
Japan bought 4,000 tonnes of Canadian rapeseed for last-half May/first-half June shipment, nearly completing buying for May needs, trade sources said. Price details were not available.
Reuter
